texts.Description:SmartSoftware.Mailing.Smtp.H: The name or IP address of the host used for SMTP transactions.
texts.Description:SmartSoftware.Mailing.Smtp.P: The port used for SMTP transactions.
The password for the user name associated with the credentials.
texts.Description:SmartSoftware.Mailing.Smtp.D: The domain or computer name that verifies the credentials.
texts.Description:SmartSoftware.Mailing.Smtp.E: Whether the SmtpClient uses Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to encrypt the connection.
texts.Description:SmartSoftware.Mailing.Smtp.U: Whether the DefaultCredentials are sent with requests.
